title: Document Intake Checker
short_description: Checklist-driven document quality and completeness validator.
full_description:
## Overview

Document Intake Checker helps staff and volunteers identify missing paperwork before filing deadlines.

### Highlights

- Matter-specific document checklists
- Missing item alerts
- Progress dashboard-ready output

title: Caseflow Optimizer
short_description: A triage and case routing tool for legal aid intake teams.
full_description:
## Overview

Caseflow Optimizer helps legal aid clinics route requests to the right support track quickly.

### Highlights

- Rules-based intake categorization
- Priority scoring for urgent matters
- Exportable reports for weekly operations

title: Hearing Reminder
short_description: Automated hearing reminder templates for client communications.
full_description:
## Overview

Hearing Reminder provides standard multilingual reminders that reduce no-shows and improve preparation outcomes.

### Highlights

- Court-date reminder template library
- Translation-ready content structure
- Configurable sending cadence guidance
